title: Executive Order-Amendment of Civil Service Rules
content: Special Departmental Rule No. 1 is hereby amended by adding to the places therein excepted from examination in the Department of the Treasury the following:
[NAME] in the Bureau of Statistics: One expert in mechanical designs and in diagramming commercial and financial facts.
citation: Grover Cleveland, Executive Order-Amendment of Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/206416
